settings.title: REFER & SAVE 15%
settings.text: Refer friends and colleagues - when they make a purchase they’ll receive 15% off their order and you’ll receive 15% off your next order!

settings.title: GET $20 OFF $150+
settings.text: Sign up to receive occasional texts alerts. SMS subscribers receive special offers and $20 off their next order $150+. First-time subscribers only. Restrictions may apply.

settings.title: SIGN UP FOR EMAIL, SAVE 10%
settings.text: Sign up to receive occasional marketing emails and get 10% off your next order. First-time subscribers only. Restrictions may apply.

While Gerry Davis Sports does not have an official partnership with NASO, we do provide a 10% discount to customers able to prove active membership. To request a discount on your order, please contact our customer care team via live chat.

settings.title: HOW ELSE CAN I RECEIVE DISCOUNTS & PROMOTIONS

settings.text: From time-to-time we may run site wide promotions but most offers are sent only to subscribers of our email/sms marketing list and followers of our social channels. All public offers will otherwise be prominantly displayed.
